multimodal.desc: We combine speech and subtitle signals to achieve more accurate and robust transcription. This dual-channel recognition reduces errors and ensures better alignment with the original content, especially in noisy or complex audio scenes.

emotional.title: Emotional Speech
emotional.desc: Our voice synthesis models generate expressive, emotionally rich speech that enhances storytelling and viewer engagement. By capturing tone, rhythm, and nuance, we make AI voices feel more human and relatable.
